text:
Orphans in Distress

A chaotic room, Katerina distraught.  
“Where am I to go?” she wailed.  
“Is there no justice on earth?”  

---

Katerina rushes through the crowd.  
“Polenka, stay with the children!”  
“I’ll find justice!”  

---

In a corner, Polenka clutches the little ones.  
“Where’s Mama?” she whispers, trembling.  

---

Raskolnikov, deep in thought.  
“Now it’s time for me to go.”  
“Well, Sonia, we shall see!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna, desperate for justice for her children, rushes into the street amidst chaos, leaving her terrified daughter behind.
